ValidationRule.description: If Lead status is any thing except Junk enquiries, Country, State,City and all Qualification Parameters are Mandatory.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(AND(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,'Digital'),ISPICKVAL(RW_Lead_Sub_Source__c,'Website_enquiry'))), OR(AND(RW_Corporate_Web_To_Lead__c, !ISNEW()), !RW_Corporate_Web_To_Lead__c), OR(AND(RW_Lead_From_CTI__c, !ISNEW()), !RW_Lead_From_CTI__c), OR(AND(RW_Lead_through_Email__c, !ISNEW()), !RW_Lead_through_Email__c), OR(ISPICKVAL( Status,'Not Sure'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Interested'), ISPICKVAL( Status ,'Not Interested')), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Country__c)) , AND(ISBLANK(TEXT( RW_Budget__c ) ), ISBLANK(TEXT( RW_Budget_Rs_in_Cr__c ) )), ISBLANK(TEXT( RW_Configuration__c ) ), ISBLANK(TEXT( RW_Time_line__c ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill the Country,State, City, Budget,Configuration, Preferred Location,Time line.
